txt.en: You have found the Charred Ledger
You have found the Tattered Ledger
You have found the Ruined Ledger
You have found an instructional ledger within the School of Tham Mírdain, but it has been charred beyond hope of recovery.
You have found a tattered ledger. Its words are still somewhat readable.
Find the forgotten instructional ledgers within the School at Tham Mírdain.
You have found the Mouldy Ledger
You have found a ledger, but it has been completely defaced.
You have found a ledger covered in mould. It is utterly useless.
Find the forgotten instructional ledgers within the School at Tham Mírdain.
Find the forgotten instructional ledgers within the School at Tham Mírdain.
